EmailTemplate.name: Grad Reminder Warks 3pm
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Graduation on 29 October
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REMINDER OF INVITATION TO YOUR GRADUATION
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on your commitment and contribution to The Challenge this summer. It would be great to see you at the graduation.
If you have not yet let us know if you are coming, please RSVP by clicking on the following link: http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3a132cae1853d4e&q1={!Contact.Id}&q2=1
Where: Coventry Central Hall Warwick Lane Coventry CV1 2HA
When: 29/10/2011
15:00 - 17:30
www.the-challenge.org
facebook.com/thechallengenetwork
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
